title: 西蒙·拉特演绎《帕西法尔》
short_description: 瓦格纳称《帕西法尔》是“为拜罗伊特剧院舞台量身定制的节日剧目”。事实上，由于其别出心裁的表现形式，称其为“歌剧”并不十分恰当。从内容上看，《帕西法尔》并不涉及歌剧中常有的阴谋或感情纠葛，却充盈着瓦格纳作品特有的人性救赎。抛开文字内容，作品中极富魅力的音乐也一样慑人心魄，令人陶醉。这场由西蒙·拉特携手斯图尔特·斯盖尔顿、尼娜·史蒂梅共同演绎的版本受到了观众的一致好评，媒体也称赞其为“21世纪绚丽夺目的《帕西法尔》”。

interview.title: 西蒙·拉特爵士对话莎拉·维利斯
interview.description: In the spring of 2018, Sir Simon Rattle, who ends his tenure as chief conductor of the Berliner Philharmoniker this year, was welcomed by horn player Sarah Willis to her popular Live Lounge. His last opera production together with the orchestra was Richard Wagner’s Parsifal in a staged production at the Easter Festival in Baden-Baden followed as usual by concert performances in the Berlin Philharmonie. During rehearsals in Berlin, the conductor answered questions put to him live by audience members from around the world. In addition to how Sir Simon sees Wagner’s “Festival Play for the Consecration of the Stage”, he was asked among other things about the challenges faced by a symphony orchestra such as the Berliner Philharmoniker when performing opera.
interview.short_description: 在这段柏林爱乐在线直播对话中， 西蒙·拉特爵士与圆号演奏家莎拉·维利斯聊起了柏林爱乐乐团于巴登-巴登复活节音乐节上演的瓦格纳歌剧《帕西法尔》。
